forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers scattered about the area this morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers during the morning. Then partly to mostly cloudy this afternoon. High 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
